If the transformation \\( M \\) is applied to the initial state \\( z(0) \\), and the system is allowed to evolve under the dynamics specified by \\( z(t) \\), will the trajectory of \\( w(t) \\) at time T be the same as the trajectory of \\( Mz(t) \\) directly computed for each t?
